location: Hurghada - Safaga Road KM 32, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84651 Egypt
description: Fort Arabesque Resort, Spa, & Villas promises tranquility and opulence with its 517 luxurious rooms, suites, private apartments and 65 villas. Four dining venues, five swimming pools, including a children's pool (three of which are heated), a state-of-the-art gym, world-class Thai-managed Spa and sports facilities as well as I-Dive, a five-star IDC PADI dive center, guarantee a fun and unforgettable hotel experience. Inspired by the Sardinian roots of its architects, Fort Arabesque Resort & Spa combines distinctive Italian and Arabic accents in its architecture, from its imposing medieval fort structure to its interior touches and décor, where the different shades of Egyptian cave stones from Aswan blend with the antique fine wood furnishings of oriental designs. We would like to introduce our new concept as well, which is unique in Egypt. Nestled within the Fort Arabesque resort, The Villas offer its guests luxurious accommodation, space and privacy in addition to a more personal and dedicated service. Each of the 65 Villas (40 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom, 19 units with 1 bedroom + 1 bathroom with a sea view, 6 units with 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms) is tastefully decorated to reflect the mix of Arabic accents and Mediterranean influences of the Fort Arabesque Resort. All units have private garden and terrace with private access to a secluded swimming pool exclusive to The Villas. To ensure a fast and efficient service, the check-in is done through a private reception. The residents also have access to the Pavilion which is a private lounge where the villa guests can enjoy a semi-served upgraded breakfast in the morning. For lunch and dinner time the Pavilion functions as an A’la Carte Restaurant, giving the opportunity to enjoy a fine dining experience. The extra benefits of the Villa Guests include free Wi-Fi, free Gym usage and various discounts in the different outlets of the hotel. Guests at The Villas are free to use all the facilities and enjoy the same ‘all inclusive’ benefits at the resort with quick access to the main restaurant and the beach as well.

location: Yussif Afifi Road, Hurghada 84111 Egypt
description: The Steigenberger ALDAU Beach Hotel is an exclusive luxury hotel built in fascinating Swahili architecture, situated directly on the beach at the southern tip of Hurghada with a spectacular view of the sea. The hotel is famous for its luxurious spacious rooms and superb restaurants, and it presents a variety of unrivaled features; from a unique Lazy River, inviting you to lose yourself in the tranquility of a gentle river ride, floating through the landscaped gardens until you disembark into an amazing pool covering 5,000 m3. A private beach that is almost half a kilometer in length, just to relax or to play, with "Ilios" the world class dive club and aqua center, where you can scuba dive, snorkel, go windsurfing, water skiing or parasailing. A 9 hole par 3 golf course, floodlit, for playing a challenging game of golf under the summer night sky. As for the feeling of complete well-being; immerse yourself in 1000 m2 of the "Planet Spa" for pampering body treatments.

location: Piece 33, Sahl Hasheesh, Hurghada 84521 Egypt
description: Opening our doors for the first time in 2009, we have strived to become Luxury Adult Only Resort who is providing upscale hospitality from the heart. Through authenticity and care, we created unique memorable experiences for our guests that will be treasured for a lifetime. Over the past decade we have became destination of choice to our guests and will continue to do so for years to come. Our secret lays in our incredible team who put the soul in hospitality every day. The needs of our guests are in the forefront of everything we do. Located in Sahl Hasheesh on Egypt's Red Sea coast, an area made internationally famous by the combination of its clear skies, azure sea, and stark beauty of its desert mountains, Premier Le Rêve Hotel & Spa adds even more beauty to this work of art through its wonderfully landscaped grounds and elegant structures. Spend your vacation in luxury while enjoying the wonderful all year round weather and basking in the golden rays of the sun. This top-drawer hotel is a heaven for holidaying couples. It has its own private beach, a deluxe spa and a cluster of pools with sea views. Plus it’s adults-only, which means plenty of peace and quiet.

description: Highlights: • Family friendly resort with oriental flair • 400 m long private sandy beach • 1 buffet and 4 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Large gym with latest machine equipment • Access to facilities of neighboring sister hotel including Aqua Park in SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort Experience the Egyptian hospitality at the 5-star SUNRISE Mamlouk Palace Resort with the Arabian flair, a special family friendly atmosphere and hotel facilities. The private sandy beach offers relaxing hours directly at the Red Sea. A large variety of sports facilities including a fully equipped gym and CrossFit area, as well as a full-serviced spa (chargeable) will diversify your stay. Relax at one of comfortably designed 530 rooms & suites and enjoy the stunning pool areas the resort has to offer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. In SUNRISE Mamlouk Place Resort you can enjoy an all- inclusive dine around experience including 1 international buffet restaurant and 4 à-la-carte restaurants with Mexican, Asian, Indian and Spanish cuisine. In addition, the resort houses 7 Bars & Cafés: 2 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Lounge Bar, a Shisha Tent, 1 club and a 24h Lobby Bar. For more choices and flexibility, guests can enjoy the all-inclusive facilities of the neighbouring sister hotel SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort, including the large Aqua Park for the whole family as well as 4 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Egyptian, Burger House, and Mongolian Cuisine. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations). Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

location: Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84513 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Luxury resort in Makadi Bay • Boho-chic architecture • Introduction of premium all-inclusive concept with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner • Swim-up and Jacuzzi rooms & suites • Royal club privileges, including restaurant, lounge & pool for suite bookers Located in the heart of Makadi Bay, the sea-front resort features an aesthetic, coastal design, with a set of unmatched, sophisticated facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. Featuring the Premium All-Inclusive concept, guests are entitled to many additional amenities including serving sparkling wine upon arrival, daily mini-bar refill, and premium imported alcohol across selected outlets. Dine at one of the 3 premium à-la-carte restaurants with fancy à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including International, Italian and Greek cuisine. Enjoy delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Lounges with one F&B outlet operating 24/7. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort features a wide array of 240 rooms that define luxury and coziness to lay out the options of lodging befitting guests’ needs; including Superior and Deluxe Rooms, Jacuzzi and Swim-Up Suites, as well as Executive Pool & Jacuzzi Suites. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks & beer, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, Tucana Resort offers “Royal Club Services” for suite bookers, which include: Limousine service, express check-in and check-out, in-room espresso machine, access to royal pool, lounge and restaurant with designated Royal Club Manager and more. Moreover, the resort grants you access to a huge aqua park with 18 different slides. In addition, the bay lies on the most beautiful snorkeling and diving spots, thus offers a unique exploring experience of the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our premium all-inclusive concept includes: breakfast, lunch and dinner in a la carte restaurants (unlimited reservations),1 F&B outlet operating 24/7. 24-hours snacks, hot, cold, local alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Availability of fresh juices and premium & imported alcoholic beverages. Fruits & cookies upon arrival, daily minibar refill, tea & coffee making facilities with complimentary daily refill, daily turndown service, bathrobes & slippers, pillow menu (upon request). Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel Premium AI Formula for detailed information.

location: Safaga Road, Km 12, Hurghada 84517 Egypt
description: Rixos Premium Magawish Suites & Villas is the perfect destination for everyone traveling to Hurghada, Red Sea. Our premium ultra all-inclusive hotel offers you only luxurious suites and villas with beachfront accommodation, all with scenic views, flat TV, safe box, mini-bar (refilled daily), Espresso machine, pillow menu, bath amenities and much more. Elevate your experiences with direct access to the pools from all villas and some suites, also upon your request we have private beach and pool cabanas. Enjoy 1 km private sandy beach, 30 Swimming pools (heated in winter), ten bars, six a-la-carte restaurants (Turkish, Asian, Sea Food, BBQ, Brazilian and International), Rixy Kids Club, sports club and stunning spa. Entertain yourself and family with beach and pool activities, tennis courts, mini football, kids’ pools, modern fitness center, diving center, horse riding and more. Stay fit & healthy at “Exclusive Sports Club” with professional trainers for yoga, Zumba, aqua aerobics, dance lessons, pilates and cross-fit. “Rixy Kids Club” for your kids features master classes, craft room, mini disco, children’s cinema, playground and themed days. name: ZYA Regina Resort and Aqua Park Hurghada
amenities: Free internet,Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Free breakfast,Beach,Entertainment staff,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Kids club,Public wifi,Paid internet,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Poolside bar,Evening entertainment,Airport transportation,Shuttle bus service,Business Centre with Internet Access,Banquet room,Meeting rooms,Spa,Massage,Concierge,Shops,Sun umbrellas,24-hour front desk,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Ironing service,Air conditioning,Private beach,Private balcony,Room service,Safe,Non-smoking rooms,Suites,Family rooms
location: Sheraton Road, Hurghada 11511 Egypt
description: We have been to Zya 2 times, in the beginning and in the end of our stay.   Breakfast: the buffet breakfast has a variety of options (sweets, different types of bread, vegetables, eggs, meat, omelette and crepes made at the moment, coffee and juices). The breakfast time is from 7 to 10 am and at 10 am they start already removing food and coffee machine, they were not very flexible although people were still eating.   Rooms: in our first stay we originally had reservation for a bungalow but when we arrived it was "upgraded" to a normal room with pool/sea view. The room was clean, with bottled water and clean towels. The safe in the closet was broken, but in the end there is no need to use it. Although it is stated that WiFi is not available in the room, we could reach it from the balcony or downstairs in the hall.  In our second stay we had a room with city view. We arrived in the weekend and there were more people compared to the first stay. So it was a bit noisy until 1 am.  The fridge and airco can also be quite noisy. In the morning the fire alarm rang (by mistake) and the staff started the room service before the check out time so they knocked our door while we were still sleeping.   Position: zya is in Sigala, on the main street full of restaurants and bazaars. From the hotel you can easily reach the marina (around 10 min walking). Hurghada old town is about 5 km (so we took a taxi).   Beach: we enjoyed our time at the beach,  we also rented masks for snorkeling (5 euro for 2 masks in total). Drawback:  The music at the beach at 11 am was very loud and we had to ask multiple times to switch it off.   Overall we paid around 22 euro per person per night so we believe that it is a very good deal considering that a 5-star hotel is much more expensive. ZYA is clean and quite comfortable so it is a good deal if you are willing to accept that it is not a fancy hotel.…

description: Aqua Blu Resort is a hotel with a lot to offer guests of all ages. The hotel has a quite location in the outskirts of Hurghada, where you can go by bus, taxi or the hotel's shuttle service if you would like to explore Hurghada. The hotel is located just a walk away from the sandy beach where you can snorkel or dive in the Red Sea. Sun loungers and parasols at the beach are free to use for the hotel guests. There are three buffet restaurants and six bars at the hotel, and All Inclusive is included for all hotel guests. The restaurants are serving dishes from the Italian, Oriental and Asian cuisine. There are also snacks and drinks included in between the meals. The pool area is large and contains of several pools for all ages. There is also a water park with water slides in the hotel area which all guests can use for free. There are sun loungers and parasols in the pool area and pool waiter service. Aqua Blu Resort is offering a lot of activities.

description: Seek out an outstanding experience and an unforgettable vacation at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort -Grand Select-. Nestled directly at a sandy beach with a private lagoon on the Red Sea, the 5-star deluxe resort comes with a wonderful garden surrounding and large pool areas including 3 pools and one jacuzzi pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The spacious 364 rooms at SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort offer all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable holiday at the Red Sea. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, SUNRISE Crystal Bay offers sea view suites, that can come with private Jacuzzi or pool area and royal club privileges. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 5 a-la-carte restaurants serving Mediterranean, Indian, Greek, Egyptian Cuisine (included in all-inclusive) and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). I addition, the resort houses 9 Bars & Cafes: Pool Bar, 2 Beach Bars, Cocktail Bar & Lounge, Sports Bar, Shisha Cafe, Royal Club Lounge, a club and a 24h Lobby Bar. SUNRISE Crystal Bay Resort features a fully equipped gym, luxury spa & beauty salon (chargeable). The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Soft and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge.

description: LABRANDA Royal Makadi is a perfect blend between elegance and uniqueness. It’s absolutely stunning setting in Makadi Bay, overlooking its own pristine private beach makes it as remarkable holiday destination. An endless variety of activities awaits with diving, water sports, snorkeling, kayak, canoes on the crystal blue waters and coral reefs showcasing the magical underwater world of the Red Sea. The rooms are contemporary with terraces overlooking the pools and gardens. LABRANDA Royal Makadi follows an extensive All Inclusive concept offering various dining options for lunch and dinner at Makadi Promenade. Makadi Promenade is located between LABRANDA Royal Makadi and LABRANDA Club Makadi and features amazing dining outlets such as the Greek “Taverna Paros”, the Cuban “Pequeña Habana”, the Rock & Roll Burger House, the Yum Asian Kitchen & Bar, the Oriental “Café Cairo” and the Gelateria “Giardino delle Rose” LABRANDA Royal Makadi itself has several classic resort-style amenities such as three adult size swimming pools and a children’s pool. Guests also have access to the resort’s gym, tennis courts, squash and archery range. The hotel was designed with families in mind. As a result, the dedicated kids' pool adds further value for families with toddlers. Additionally, the Resort has an active kids club. The latter is a place where children can take part in various other activities. Furthermore, LABRANDA Royal Makadi also has a conference room on request.

description: Egypt’s Red Sea is teeming with colourful sea life and unspoilt coral reefs. Its crystal clear waters and unique underwater gardens are globally renowned as an aquatic paradise for beginners and advanced divers. Spanning 48 acres on the Red Sea shore, our all suite hotel has been carefully designed to allow you space. It features high domed ceilings and is bathed in natural light; and dotted with traditional design elements; from the auspicious eight pointed star to neoclassic columns and handcrafted lanterns. Classical touches that add a distinctive sense of place. Opulent suites with unrestricted ocean views, international fine dining, water sports, and a range of PADI certified dives suitable for beginners as well as advanced divers. Coupled with our sincere hospitality and attention to your every need.

description: The Swiss Inn Resort is an art deco-styled resort hotel that stands on the shores of the beautiful Red Sea. The hotel has 401 rooms spanning three floors, and on-site facilities, include free Wi-Fi, conference/banquet facilities, tennis court, squash and gym. Rooms are equipped with air conditioning, tea & coffee making facilities, mini bar, and satellite TV. Several on-site restaurants and bars serve guests with local and international dishes and drinks. One of the hotel’s major attractions is the diversity of swimming pools and the idyllic location on the shores of the Red Sea. Commanding a perfect location by the Touristic promenade where everything is around. Swiss Inn Hurghada Resort is an oasis of relaxation, where you can enjoy the private sandy beach, Aqua play pool and an array of leisure facilities. Ideally overlooking the amazing Red Sea, Swiss Inn Resort is the right place for those who seek underwater exploration. The resort features private marina with water sports center offering variety of water activities as well as a fully equipped diving center. Indulge yourself with a relaxing massage treatment in the on-site spa offering sauna, steam, Turkish hammam and Jaccuzzi.

description: LABRANDA Club Paradisio El Gouna is an all-inclusive beachfront resort built along the nicest bay of El Gouna on the Red Sea coast of Egypt. A myriad of activities, cheerful entertainment, and friendly service characterize this comfortable retreat in a beautiful natural setting. A wide array of shopping, dining, and entertainment hotspots are found only a few minutes away in the colorful Downtown area and in the elegant Abu Tig Marina. Boasting an extensive choice of Club Rooms and Suites, the Labranda Club Paradisio accommodations are spread out in low buildings amid well-tended gardens. A 4-star Green Star Hotel certification attests to the hotel’s efforts deployed to preserve the environment. The club hotel welcomes children of all ages and is an ideal getaway for families. The Club Paradisio’s private sea beach borders one of El Gouna’s most beautiful bays. It boasts fine sand and turquoise water.

location: Sheraton Road - Sakkala Area, Hurghada 84511 Egypt
description: MinaMark Resort and Spa is located in Sakala area, downtown of Hurghada. It features 24 hours all inclusive meals, bright and modern rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, a private beach area, Aqua park and several restaurants. Rooms are equipped with air-conditioned, satellite TV and a minibar; safe box and coffee tray. the bathrooms are stocked with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms overlooking sea and pool view, and others with a garden or city view. You can enjoy your breakfast, lunch & dinner from the best local and international dishes in a buffet style with theme variations on their menus each day. Guests can also choose from 3 high-quality a la carte restaurants. Italian cuisine can be sampled at the Piccola Italian Restaurant; Chinese dishes are served at YumYum Restaurant, while you can enjoy the catch of the day in the Sea bride restaurant whilst admiring beautiful sea view by the beach. Also don't miss the unique sushi taste at Ora lobby bar. You can enjoy some relaxing massages, treatments & Turkish bath in one of the best spas the downtown area, while the children are having fun in the Kids club or playground. The reception can gladly help the guest to arrange different activities, such as desert safaris, water sports or sea cruising. The famous “Mamsha” promenade is only 2 minutes’ drive away and the new Marina is a walking distance. Hurghada International Airport is 5 minutes' drive away from the hotel. Minamark Resort & Spa is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Hurghada, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Guests of Minamark Resort & Spa can easily experience some of Hurghada's most well-known attractions by Hurghada down town.

location: Sahl Hasheesh, Hurghada 84521 Egypt
description: ALBATROS CITADEL RESORT SAHL HASHEESH! Heaven on earth! A Sunken Paradise Reborn! Our exclusive luxury architecture built with natural coral stones which has been hand chiseled from nearby mountains is a true architectural achievement. The Albatros Citadel Resort with an atmosphere of the ports in Southern France or the Amalfi coast embraces a large marina where you can enjoy a touch of a small Mediterranean village with its own harbor. Overlooking the Red Sea, each spacious and luxuriously appointed guest room features spectacular sea views. A unique holiday with water sports, boat trips, marina and private beach extended to 1.6 km long, 3 manmade sea lagoons inside an amazing house reef. Relax at the swimming pools elevated and scattered around for your convenience in the resort and enjoy our state-of-the-art health club and gym. Book a wellness journey with our team of professional in our on-site Spa. Conveniently located only 20 minutes drive from Hurghada International Airport.

location: 32 Hurghada - Safaga Road, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84945 Egypt
description: The Stella Di Mare Makadi Beach Resort & Spa is located in the prominent Makadi Bay area, on Egypt's beautiful Red Sea Riviera. Makadi is a peaceful bay with many opportunities for snorkeling and scuba diving. The semi-tropical climate makes this both a summer and winter resort. With its warm, healthy climate and the beauties of the coral reefs, this is a place to delight sun seekers and water sports enthusiasts alike. Makadi Bay is a convenient 25km south of Hurghada International Airport. The location makes it easy to access the town of Hurghada, and there are many other notable places of interest nearby, such as the island of Giftun, which is a Marine National Park, where desert and marine life are protected by law. In fact, much of the Red Sea area has a protected status. The Stella Makadi Resort & Spa is situated on a white sandy beach, and has a spectacular house reef very close by, which guests may use for snorkeling. In addition to the natural beauty of its setting, the resort has the advantage of many facilities and services to ensure a holiday that offers a wide choice of activities. There is a Spa and Health club, a shopping mall and a discotheque, to name just a few Stella Makadi Resort & Spa guests are assured of dedicated service, with all their needs taken care of in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere

location: Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84513 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Family resort in Makadi Bay • Private sandy beach • 7 pools + aqua park (18 slides) • 1 buffet and 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Adults only designated area SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort is the perfect place for a fun and relaxing holiday. The 5-star resort is located in the heart of Makadi Bay, a main region with the best diving and snorkelling areas. The resort is built on a serene landscape surrounded by lush gardens, seven magnificent pools and a large aqua park to keep you splashing at all times. Adults can enjoy adults- only designated areas on the beach and pool as well as 4 bars & clubs. Additionally, the large gym with latest machine equipment and the in- house spa are available for adults- only (16+). Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort offers 465 rooms including family rooms with bunk beds or family suites with extra children's room. All rooms come with SAT LED TV, safe box minibar, tea & coffee facilities and a terrace or balcony. SUNRISE Royal Makadi Resort offers 1 international buffet restaurant and 8 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Mexican, Mediterranean, Bedouin, Asian, Steak and Roots Diet & Light Cuisine. The specialty Restaurant Felucca serving Seafood cuisine is available against extra charge. The resort offers 10 different theme bars including 4 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Shisha Café, Victoria Pub & Aquarius Club (16+), 2 Lobby Bars, one operating 24h. The extensive pool areas feature 7 swimming pools, including children’s pool with multiple slides. Guests can exercise on the jogging track or at the well-equipped gym. For those who love an active holiday, the Resort features 3 Football Courts, Multipurpose Court, Volleyball Court and many other activities such as Evening Animation Shows, Amphitheatre, Aquarius Club with Resident DJ. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 37km (40 min) to Hurghada Centre and 32km (33 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

location: 32 Hurghada - Safaga Road, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84945 Egypt
description: The Stella Di Mare Makadi Beach Resort & Spa is located in the prominent Makadi Bay area, on Egypt's beautiful Red Sea Riviera. Makadi is a peaceful bay with many opportunities for snorkeling and scuba diving. The semi-tropical climate makes this both a summer and winter resort. With its warm, healthy climate and the beauties of the coral reefs, this is a place to delight sun seekers and water sports enthusiasts alike. Makadi Bay is a convenient 25km south of Hurghada International Airport. The location makes it easy to access the town of Hurghada, and there are many other notable places of interest nearby, such as the island of Giftun, which is a Marine National Park, where desert and marine life are protected by law. In fact, much of the Red Sea area has a protected status. The Stella Makadi Resort & Spa is situated on a white sandy beach, and has a spectacular house reef very close by, which guests may use for snorkeling. In addition to the natural beauty of its setting, the resort has the advantage of many facilities and services to ensure a holiday that offers a wide choice of activities. There is a Spa and Health club, a shopping mall and a discotheque, to name just a few Stella Makadi Resort & Spa guests are assured of dedicated service, with all their needs taken care of in a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere

description: GOLDEN BEACH Resort - Hurghada is located in a quiet location northwest of Hurghada directly on a wide and beautiful beach (bathing shoes recommended). El Gouna is approx 10Km away, and the center of Hurghada is approx. 15Km. To the International airport it is 20 m. GOLDEN BEACH Resort - Hurghada is consists of a main building and several adjoining buildings, lay in a lush palm tree garden with many exotic trees. A great choice for a beach vacation - specially for families (shallow water).Divers appreciate the diving center and Kite Surfers the Kite Station which are located in the hotel premises. The popular hotel complex features an attractive pool area with a 200 meter long ʺlazy riverʺ, one of the largest amphitheaters in the red sea and many sport facilities. The resort offers different types of comfortable accommodation (in total 435 spacious rooms) such as family rooms, double rooms with and without sea view as well as superior rooms. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, telephone, TV, hairdryer, Safe Box (free) and Mini Bar. The resort provides multiple choice of pools, 11 in total: Relax pool, Adults only pool, 2 separate Kid’s pool, 2 pools connected by an artificial river leading from the main building to the beach and the Golden Beach Aqua Park with 11 Water slides + 4 small slides for smaller children.

location: Km 20 Safaga Road, Hurghada Egypt
description: SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort is an elegant 5-star resort situated directly by a private sandy beach on an extensive garden landscape. Families can enjoy their time at the Aqua Park and the Family Pool, while couples and friends can relax at the "Adults Only” area by the beach or enjoy the day at the full- serviced spa (chargeable). SUNRISE Garden Beach Resort welcomes you to a world of fun, and exciting activities. The resort has developed a strong sports concept. At the all-inclusive resort, you have the opportunity to supplement sun and relaxation with a wide range of activities suitable for the whole family including fully equipped 400qm gym with the latest machine equipment and weights & a large cross fit area, 11-man football pitch, tennis courts, spinning classes, archery, swimming courses of 25 meters in saltwater in one of the lagoons at the beach and much more. The Resort comprises of 481 comfortable rooms, including family rooms & suites with balcony or terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. The resort offers an all- inclusive dine around experience with a wide selection of exquisite dining options including 1 international buffet restaurant and 4 à-la-carte restaurants: Italian, Egyptian, Burger House, and Mongolian Cuisine. The specialty Restaurant Nasaya serving Fusion cuisine is available against extra charge. I addition, the resort houses 8 Bars & Cafés: 2 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Adults-Only Bar, Billiard Bar, a Shisha Tent, 1 pub and a 24h Lobby Bar. For more choices and flexibility, guests can enjoy the all-inclusive facilities of the neighbouring sister hotel SENTIDO Mamlouk Palace Resort, including 3 à-la-carte restaurants with Mexican, Asian and Spanish cuisine. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club let by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. The breathless sunset, the fascinating views of the desert and mountains, and the turquoise waters of the beaches combined with excellent service will leave our guests with unforgettable joyful memories. Located 19km (20 min) to Hurghada Centre and 15km (16 min) to Hurghada International Airport, the Resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations). Snacks from 12-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge.

description: Welcome to Beach Albatros Resort Beach Albatros Resort is a luxurious hideaway where visitors can relax and enjoy the marvels of the Red Sea with summer weather all year round. Beachfront, all inclusive resort is surrounded with 123,000 m² of landscaped gardens with sparkling pools and the crystal blue sea. It is only 15 minutes far from Hurghada Airport and 20 minutes from the city center. Beach Albatros Resort is a pond-like picture of blue-green tranquility, perfect for windsurfing, kayaking, and other water sports. Its gentle waves and shallow waters make bathing safe for children and adults alike. Its long beach is perfect for jogging or long walks at sunrise or sundown.

description: Ancient Sands Resort is the PLACE to BE on Egypt's Red Sea Riviera. The resort in El Gouna contains over 80 apartment suites offering guests a relaxed alternative to more traditional styles of hotel accommodation plus 56 Deluxe hotel rooms. Lush landscaping surrounds the suites at Ancient Sands to provide a tropical paradise amidst the desert. The apartment suites themselves provide fitted kitchens, private living areas with en suite bathrooms and fantastic terraces overlooking the exceptional views. The suites range from one to three bedrooms providing an ideal option for any situation whether an individual traveler, couple, family or group of friends. The popular Piazza Restaurant offering an international cuisine is at the heart of the resort and open for lunch, while the newly opened Crumbs Café offers freshly baked bread, roasted coffees and patisserie to enjoy. Ancient Sands Resort provides a homely yet luxurious holiday accommodation in El Gouna, providing access to the best the Red Sea has to offer from diving to beaches, water sports to nightlife.

description: Continental HoteL Hurghada is located in Hurghada's Promenade and local attractions include New Marina as well as nearby shopping and entertainment facilities. Hotel Features. This Hurghada property has a private beach offering diving and large variety of water sports directly from the beach. Dining options at Moevenpick Resort Hurghada include a buffet restaurant and 2 specialty restaurants, a pool side restaurant and a beach bar. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Recreational amenities include an outdoor pool, a children's pool, a health club, a sauna, and a fitness facility. Spa amenities include massage/treatment rooms and beauty services. This 5star property offers a large event space consisting of banquet facilities, conference/meeting rooms and exhibit space, audio-visual equipment and wireless Internet access in public areas. Concierge services and tour assistance are available as well Airport shuttle service. Guestrooms. 252 air-conditioned guestrooms at Continetal Hotel Hurghada feature minibars and coffee/tea makers. All accommodations have balconies and enjoy great views over the pool and the Red Sea. Bathrooms feature, bath tub, bidets, makeup/shaving mirrors and hair dryers. In addition to safes, guestrooms offer direct dial phones, Satellite television and internet access.

description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travellers visiting Hurghada, Sea Star Beau Rivage is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Sea Star Beau Rivage makes it easy to enjoy the best of Hurghada.Sea Star Beau Rivage is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as internet access is offered to guests.The hotel features room service and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travellers visiting Hurghada. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.El Dahar (3.1 mi), located nearby, makes Sea Star Beau Rivage a great place to stay for those interested in visiting this popular Hurghada landmark.While staying at Sea Star Beau Rivage, you can find some great restaurants within walking distance of the hotel including Sunset Restaurant (1.0 mi), ‪Romantico Restaurant and Bar (0.7 mi), and Da Nanni Restaurant Color Beach (0.2 mi).If you are looking for something to do in the area, Coptic Cathedral of Saint Shenouda (1.0 mi) is a popular attraction that is within walking distance of Sea Star Beau Rivage.Whether you’re travelling for business, pleasure or both, Sea Star Beau Rivage is sure to make your visit to Hurghada one worth remembering.

description: Cook's Club El Gouna is a modern and charismatic hotel in El Gouna. The hotel is built along a saltwater lagoon that separates the island of Kafr El Gouna from downtown mainland area. Only a short walk from the hotel you find everything you can ask from a modern holiday destination, restaurants, supermarkets and galleries. And on the nearby Zeytouna Island you also find some of the best snorkeling in El Gouna, well worth a visit! At the heart of the hotel is the Cantina – a mecca of flavors and colors. Here you can get fresh local and international dishes from different food station. By the pool you can enjoy relaxed tunes and more speedy beats played by handpicked DJ's and sip on fresh juices and tasty cocktails created by Berlin-based barkeeper David Wiedemanat the Captain Cook's pool bar. If you feel like relaxing at the beach you find a lovely sandy beach just a quick walk from the hotel. Cook's Club El Gouna is an adult only hotel, with age limit 16 years.

description: Serenity Makadi Beach is located on the west banks of the Red Sea, built in Moroccan style. Opened in January 2007, this spacious five Stars Resort spans a total of 400,000 sq. meters, surrounded by large gardens, it is located directly on the Red Sea situated on its own wide beach 320m, offering spectacular views over the turquoise water and an amazing experience of a luxury life style, combined with the warmth of true Egyptian hospitality. The rooms are divided into five wings 17 clusters of 2-3 floors. You can simply relax on the hotel's beach or one of the spectacular 5 swimming pools. The resort has every possible feature to make your stay enjoyable by offering a wide range of safari and diving trips.

description: Overlooking pool and golf and surrounded by the Makadi Golf Course, Jaz Makadi Saraya Palms offers Studios and suites with furnished balconies. It has an outdoor pool and a Makadi Spa. The air-conditioned suites feature modern décor. Each offers a living room with a dining area and a flat-screen TV. They also include a minibar and kitchenette with a fridge. Guests can dine out in a number of gourmet restaurants at local Madinat Makadi. Drinks can be served at the central pool bar. The hotel has chargeable WiFi access in public areas. Car rental and tour excursions can be arranged. Hurghada Airport is a 30-minute drive from Jaz Makadi. Souk Makadi, the popular shopping area, is within 10 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. Airport shuttle service is available upon request. Jaz Makadi Saraya Palms is just 2 km away from Makadi Water World Aqua Park that offers access to 50 different slides for adults and kids excitement. A complimentary shuttle to and from the water park and the beach.

description: The Cleopatra Makadi Bay Resort is situated at the Red Sea close to Hurghada city and located directly at a water front private beach. The resort was previously managed and operated by the Aldiana Group and is now re-opening with a new concept for luxury seekers under the flag of the Cleopatra Luxury Resort.The resort is situated at the Red Sea and amounts a total area of 300.000 m². The complex offers 530 rooms divided into two to three floors buildings which are fitted in a lush garden area. The spacious pool area and the wide spread complexes offer sufficient place to retreat. Central points make it easy to get in touch with other travelers. A vast array of services and facilities is on offer, including a state-of-the-art SPA with certified professionals who offer a selected range of pampering treatments and therapies for the utmost relaxation.Guests of the Cleopatra Makadi Bay will savor the fine taste of international cuisines and the unique hospitality in all our bars and restaurants. In addition to this do the resort feature a number of shops, a supermarket, a bazaar and a pharmacy that meet the different needs of our guests.We promise an exceptional holiday in Egypt in an extraordinary ambiance for all kinds of travel purposes such as leisure or business.With Cleopatra Makadi Bay’s selected All Inclusive standards you can dine in two different restaurants and enjoy chilled drinks in various bars while lounging at the private beach. Each evening offers entertainment for big and small. 5 pools, one of them heated during winter season, provide a fantastic refreshingly experience under the sun. Our on-site diving center gives you the possibility to explore and discover the unique underwater world of the Red Sea, starting at our popular house reef.Privacy and tranquility prevail in this exclusively luxurious resort at the Red Sea. Visit us and experience the clear skies, azure sea and the magnificent beauty of the dramatic mountain ranges in the background. Sheer amazing landscaped grounds and refreshing pools under the all-year-long shining sun make you’re your most precious time in the year memorable.

description: Welcome to the most breathtaking & distinctive U shape designed resort in the Red Sea with its white sand beaches that prolongs to the middle of the refreshing turquoise sea which gives a panoramic sea view to most of the hotel’s rooms. The Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA offers to guests an exceptional hospitality, for both unique services and modern facilities to ensure maximum comfort is experienced for both business and leisure travelers.Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA is a 4+ (PLUS) star hotel is consisted of 825 rooms with Red Sea view. The hotel is located around 10 kilometers from Hurghada International Airport and it takes about 15 minutes by a taxi, and the distance from City Centre is 3 kilometers.Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA Is the only resort in Hurghada which built into the sea itself, the hotel is surrounded by water from 3 sides , which mean 99% from the rooms within the sea view, as well easy access to the beach . Plus the longest coral area in the down town (on the left side of the hotel) which offering you amazing, safe and easy snorkeling Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA is a lively, all-inclusive resort on the Red Sea coast. It features white sand beaches, landscaped swimming pools and excellent diving in the hotel’s lagoon and coral reef. The spacious guest rooms at Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA each have a private balcony or terrace, offering views over the sea. All rooms feature satellite TV and air conditioning. Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA has a wide range of on-site restaurants and bars including a large international buffet, a specialist Italian restaurant and a seafood restaurant overlooking the sea. Recreational facilities include beach volleyball, water polo and a fully-equipped fitness centre. The hotel also has its own water sports centre, offering diving, windsurfing and sailing.Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & SPA has a shopping arcade with over 42 shops to meet your requirements, as well as an internet café and a hairdresser.

location: Yousef Afify Road, Hurghada 111 Egypt
description: When you mention GiftunAzur Resort in Hurghada chances are that everyone knows the name, the hotel is an iconic landmark and pioneer in the hospitality industry in Hurghada since 1984. Step into the warm colored lobby of Giftun and immediately you feel at “home”. Greeting you is our attentive and friendly personnel who exemplify the meaning of Egyptian hospitality and exceptional personal service. Nestled in acres of lush gardens and swaying palm trees enjoy an early morning jog and wonder at the variety of flowers and exotic birds you can spot on the sprawling grounds. Savor our extensive open buffet and a la carte dining options that offer delicious international and authentic Egyptian fare prepared by our outstanding chefs. Grab a mid‐afternoon snack in notorious La Piazzetta Restaurant and swoon over our signature stone oven pizzas and pasta dishes. Spend long lazy hours on what has been rated as the “best beach” location in Hurghada and enjoy snorkeling with the family till the sun sets. Experience Giftun’s water sports haven, a place that would satisfy any eager water enthusiast, be it deep sea diving adventures or just the exhilaration of sea trips

For a more active time, take some windsurfing lessons. Let the multilingual staff at King Tut arrange trips for you, including diving or quad bike safaris. Join in with the belly dance classes and volleyball games.Enjoy an evening of quality entertainment from the entertainment team and dance the night away at the nightclub. Write home about it using the free Wi-Fi internet access. Admire your lovely surroundings at the cafe among the trees and by the fountain.One of the 3 attractive restaurants offers a romantic meal on a 2-man boat. Return to shore to soak up the atmosphere at the beach bar. Try the Bedouin-style Sahara Tent, or the cozy lobby bar

location: Km 34 Hurghada-Safaga Road, Makadi Bay, Hurghada Egypt
description: LABRANDA Club Makadi is situated in a prime location in Makadi Bay, one of the most sought after areas of Hurghada. Guests here can enjoy a breathtaking beach and relish the natural beauty of this Red Sea coastal resort. The hotel is comprised of 339 rooms overlooking the hotel's swimming pools, gardens or private beach. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available in the majority of public areas. All rooms have balconies or terraces facing the pool or garden. The resort only offers All Inclusive. A wide selection of activities are available at the LABRANDA Club Makadi, ranging from water sports, deep-sea diving, non-motorized water sports, a fresh water swimming pool, children’s pool and exclusive activities such as horseback riding and quad bike tours. Additionally, the LABRANDA Club Makadi is home to a health club with massage services. A diving center is also accessible within the resort grounds, where snorkeling sessions, scuba diving, and diving safaris are offered. Non-water based activities include two tennis courts, table tennis and billiard. The hotel is also only a few minutes' drive from the Makadi and Soma Bay golf courses should you be looking for a more active non-water focused activity in the sun. LABRANDA Club Makadi's guests also have direct access to the Makadi Promenade. The latter is shared with LABRANDA Royal Makadi, our sister hotel, and it is filled with all sorts of delicious eating establishments. These include the Greek “Taverna Paros”, the Cuban Restaurant “Pequena Habana”, the Rock & Roll Burger House, the Yum Asian Kitchen & Bar, the “Cafe Cairo” and Gelateria “Giardino delle Rose.”

name: Stella Gardens Resort & Spa
location: 32 Hurghada - Safaga Road, Makadi Bay, Hurghada 84945 Egypt
description: This hotel has the nicest employees ever, friendly and welcoming. The hotel is beautiful, clean and you feel very safe like it’s your own home. The staff is very professional. Also the food looks and tastes amazing. I’m going to recommend this to my friends when I come back to Australia. They must visit Stella gardens makadi hotel. Big thanks to headquarters Maqara, Mr Walid El Shennawy of the food and beverages manage, Mr Mahmoud and Mr Ragab the main restaurant manager, and thank you to general chef and chef Mustafa and thanks to the staff and Peter for making our stay great.

description: A family friendly 4 Star resort that boasts 526 spacious rooms including 24 junior suites with an exceptional sea, pool or garden view, 8 km from Hurghada airport and 3 km from the city center, It’s one of Hurghada’s leading all-inclusive resorts. Come and savor the experience of al Fresco dining around the pool with international and oriental theme buffets that satisfy any palate. Spend long lazy hours venturing our garden reef that is just minutes away from our beaches. Enjoy the sunset panorama on the marina and disco. All you have to do is bring a partner. Relax and unwind on our private beaches that are directly on two crystal blue lagoons perfect for snorkeling or wading with the kids. Whether its windsurfing, pedal boat cruising with the family, or discovering the magic of deep sea diving, snorkeling or fishing trips, we have it all, all you have to do is sign up. At Arabia Azur Resort we want to make sure that your vacation experience is totally stress free so come on over. Just kick back and relax. You can also take advantage of play around amenities at the Adults only sister hotel, Bel Air Azur and enjoy a fun filled vacation experience.

description: Overview centrally located in Hurghada downtown and only 10 minutes’ drive to Hurghada International Airport, sits the 4 stars Casa Del Mar Resort. The resort features 204 well-designed guest rooms equipped with the amenities and facilities you will need during your stay. Whether it is a holiday with a big family, or a sweet escape with your loved ones, the features of the resort accommodation will fulfill your needs. The delightful rooms include balconies with either garden view or pool view to enjoy peaceful mornings, and to feel the gentle breeze at night. Enjoy an array of flavors from around the world at Panorama main restaurant serving an International buffet for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Spend chilled nights at little lobby bar or at le bouchon pub while you sip exotic cocktails. The private beach is an ultimate treat; dive, snorkel, and enjoy water sports and beach activities. You can enjoy so much besides basking by the beach, or taking dips in the pool. The 3 aqua slides are another addition to the fun-filled water activities; not only for you but for the little ones as well.

name: Magic Beach Hotel
amenities: Internet,Pool,Free breakfast,Beach,Entertainment staff,Concierge,Sun umbrellas,Laundry service,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast available,Breakfast buffet,Poolside bar,Evening entertainment,Air conditioning,Private beach,Safe,Refrigerator,Non-smoking rooms,Suites,Smoking rooms available
location: El Helal District 47, Hurghada 84511 Egypt
description: Magic Beach Hotel is located in the Helal Area in front of Red Sea Governorate. The hotel is 20 minutes from Hurghada International airport, private beach, a panoramic Red Sea View. The hotel's 122 unique guest rooms and suites are featured with private balcony, equipped with private bath and showers, hairdryer, individual air condition, satellite TV (LCD), mini bar, direct international local telephone, fire alarm and smoke detectors, in room safe. Situated 5 km from New Marina in Hurghada, Magic Beach Hotel welcomes guests with a restaurant and bar. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, pool or garden are featured in certain rooms. You will find a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine, hairdresser and gift shop at the property. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and the area is popular for snorkeling. District Court of Hurghada is 400 metres from Magic Beach Hotel, while Giftun Island is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Hurghada International Airport, 9 km from the property. The El Helal Area is a relatively new elite district in Dahar (the administrative district of Hurghada). There are no busy streets with several shops. In this region you will find beautiful, well-maintained houses with gardens or cozy courtyards. The northern border area coincides with the boundary of the city. To the south, you will find a military hospital and the west side is bordered by Hafr Al Batten. In El Helal, there is the main administration building of the city and the Red Sea Governorate. You can also find the Passport and Visa Office, the Transport Police, the Governor's Reception and City Hall here too. El Helal is one of the quietest areas of Dahar. The district is developing its northern outskirts and there is a new luxury residential complex 'Al Dora' (currently not yet ready).

description: There are no words to explain how disgusted we were there. Be carefull the owner is a despicable person checking bed sheets to see if they were dirty and he send 2 ladies to check the appartament to see if we steal something making us feeling like criminals..they he asked 100 euros because the bed sheet was a bit stained with henna tattoo. We had to Wash in front of him the sheet because we didnt want to pay callin us dirty people. The place is horrible the building super dirty with a tacky taste. Never again very noisy place.

name: Philip House Hotel
amenities: Safe,Room service,Laundry service,Car hire,Shuttle bus service,Dry cleaning,24-hour front desk,Currency exchange,Baggage storage,Airport transportation,Restaurant,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Parking
location: 1 Ibn Bassam St. Raml Station, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Philip House Hotel is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Alexandria, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to some of Alexandria's most popular landmarks, such as Saint Mark's Coptic Orthodox Cathedral (0.3 mi) and Lighthouse of Alexandria (1.3 mi), Philip House Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Philip House Hotel features 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Philip House Hotel, parking is available.Alexandria has plenty of cafes. So when youâre here, be sure to check out popular spots like Delices, Brazilian Coffee, and Roastery coffee, which are serving up some great dishes.Best of all, Philip House Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Alexandria attractions like Montazah Palace Gardens, which is a popular park.Enjoy your stay in Alexandria!

name: Mandara Armed Forces Apartments
amenities: Bath / shower,Kitchenware,Refrigerator,Kitchenette,Clothes rack,Seating area,Fireplace,Air conditioning
location: 818 El Geish Road, El Mandara, Alexandria Egypt
description: Good for value of money Sea view No pool Suitable for families Suitable for friends Not suitable for honeymooners No air condition Medium Furniture Clean rooms Clean kitchen Friendly staff Two elevators

name: Hotel Delta
amenities: Family rooms,Refrigerator,Room service,Air conditioning,Ironing service,Laundry service,Dry cleaning,Newspaper,Car hire,Shuttle bus service,Breakfast in the room,Restaurant,Wifi,24-hour front desk,Currency exchange,Baggage storage,Meeting rooms,Airport transportation,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Bar / lounge,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi)
location: 14 Champollion Street, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Welcome to Hotel Delta, your Alexandria âhome away from home.â Hotel Delta aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Fort Qaitbey (1.4 mi) and Lighthouse of Alexandria (1.5 mi), guests of Hotel Delta can easily experience some of Alexandria's most well known attractions.Youâll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a refrigerator and air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hotel Delta offers guests free wifi.The hotel features 24 hour front desk, room service, and newspaper. Plus, Hotel Delta offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.While visiting Alexandria, you may want to try some falafel at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Gad.Alexandria is also known for some great art galleries, including Orouba Mall Alexandra and Gallery Alex Creation, which are not too far from Hotel Delta.Hotel Delta puts the best of Alexandria at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Misr Hotel
location: 21 Amin Fekry, Al Mesallah Sharq, Qesm Al Attarin, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Even if the staff is very helpful, friendly and polite the building should not even have a habitability permit because of the terrible conditions. The hotel is located on 9th floor of an unsafe building. There are 3 elevators but just 1 is working, the door of the elevator is missing and the roof is a dump -so you could see the wall just passing by. Many floors of the building are abandoned and are also a dump. Since the elevator is not safe, we took the stairs and the stairs have a mountain of garbage and a deposit of old furniture and construction leftovers. The building is not safe neither from the structural point of view nor sanitary.

location: El Geish Road, Alexandria 21599 Egypt

name: 26th of July Hotel & Apartments
amenities: Family rooms,Bath / shower,Refrigerator,Clothes rack,Room service,Housekeeping,Private beach,Air conditioning,Ironing service,Laundry service,Dry cleaning,Massage,Breakfast in the room,24-hour front desk,Convenience store,Chapel / shrine,Spa,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Beach,Restaurant,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room
location: 409 El-Gaish Rd & Abdel El-Hamid El-Deeb Street, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: See why so many travellers make 26th of July Hotel & Apartments their lodge of choice when visiting Alexandria. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travellers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Stanley Bridge (1.4 mi) and Mustafa Kamel Necropolis (1.7 mi), guests of 26th of July Hotel & Apartments can easily experience some of Alexandria's most well known attractions.Rooms at 26th of July Hotel & Apartments provide air conditioning and a refrigerator.In addition, while staying at 26th of July Hotel & Apartments guests have access to 24 hour front desk, room service, and a convenience store. You can also enjoy a fitness center and an on-site restaurant.While visiting Alexandria, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Balbaa Village or Hosny.Best of all, 26th of July Hotel & Apartments makes it easy to experience many great Alexandria attractions like Bibliotheca Alexandrina and The Fine Arts Museum, which are some popular art museums.At 26th of July Hotel & Apartments, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Alexandria.

name: Abeer Hotel Alexandria
location: 21 Hasan El Sheikh Street Above Nassar Cafe Al Mansheya, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: This hotel is an amazing location situated between the library and the citadel which creates some amazing views of the port and out to sea. The hotel itself is less than basic, the room did not have a piece of furniture that was not broken or damaged.  The bathroom had no toilet roll or hose facilities as this was broken. The bath plug was stuck in, shower was impossible without soaking the whole room.  The staff were non existent so don't try and ask them anything. When we arrived the door was locked and it took 20mins of screaming to get someone to let us in.

name: Sea Star Hotel
amenities: Family rooms,Whirlpool bathtub,Refrigerator,Wake-up service / alarm clock,Clothes rack,Telephone,Seating area,Air conditioning,Laundry service,Baggage storage,Business Centre with Internet Access,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Restaurant,Wifi
location: 24 Amin Fikri St., Raml Station, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travellers visiting Alexandria, Sea Star Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Sea Star Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Alexandria.Guest rooms offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, and a whirlpool bathtub, and Sea Star Hotel makes getting online easy as internet access is available.In addition, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant during their visit.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Saint Mark's Coptic Orthodox Cathedral (0.3 mi) and Corniche (1.2 mi), guests of Sea Star Hotel can easily experience some of Alexandria's most well known attractions.While visiting Alexandria, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as White and Blue Restaurant, Fish Market, or Kadoura Restaurant.During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Bibliotheca Alexandrina (0.6 mi), Alexandria National Museum (0.7 mi), and Fort Qaitbey (1.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the small hotel.Sea Star Hotel is sure to make your visit to Alexandria one worth remembering.

name: Royal Crown Hotel
amenities: Laundry service,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Restaurant
location: 159 Kornich Road, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: I visited two years and found extremely unclean and could not stay more than one sleepless night and left early in the morning. I saw it again this year and realized nothing changed.. I just wanted to make sure I was not harsh in my previous review, but still awful..

name: Hotel Acropole
amenities: Family rooms,Complimentary toiletries,Bath / shower,24-hour front desk,Restaurant,Free public parking nearby
location: 1 Gamal el deen Yassin, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: We sum it up in one word, wonderful; we had an unforgettable experience on the Trek Inca Jungle Trail to Machu Picchu. Our guide very professional, his name Marco Antonio, the accommodations very tidy and clean, although it was basic, delicious food with Peruvian flavour, we enjoyed the thermal baths, hot springs of Cocalmayo, in the region of Machupicchu Sanctuary. Wonderful, Amazing !!!  What a work of architecture of the Inca culture, that is for eternity. Thanks to all the staff of Reserv  Cusco.

name: Downtown Sea View Suites
location: 10 Al Bostani Manshia, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: I booked 5 days at this hotel from 20/01/2022 through booking.com, unfortunately, I was admitted to hospital in Australia from 15/Jan- 31 Jan 2022, with first 2 days in ICU. On 17 Jan, I messaged Nada to let her know that I won't make it as I am admitted to hospital.  3 airlines and 3 hotels in Dubai, Istanbul, and Valencia refunded my full money with one giving me 30% off on my next booking, but this hotel refused to refund or even put my money as a credit. Despite hospital certificate, all communications with booking.com did not work with these owners, when I contacted Nada directly, she referred me back to booking.com and Booking.com is saying the hotel refused to refund. How do you feel about gaining money from the misfortunes of others?

name: Glim View
location: Ismail Al Habrok, Alexandria 203 Egypt
description: Booked this apartment through a popular booking site .Apartment advertised as 3 bedrooms which we needed for 5 adults.On arrival was absolutely horrified at the dirty reception area and the overwhelming smell of cats urine. Was taken to our apt on the 15th floor to find only 2 bedrooms, an absolutely filthy kitchen with no electric kettle or enough cups, crockery or cutlery. No towels or sheets and pillowcases were provided - luckily we were equipped with our own sleeping bags and towels as we were doing a camel trek in Morocco. This apartment needs to be taken off all booking sites as it is the most appalling apartment have ever stayed in

name: New Capri Hotel
amenities: Refrigerator,Private balcony,Air conditioning,Beach,Restaurant,Internet,Free internet
description: Hotel is 3 floors in a building and its entrance the same as building entrance.   1. First day on a side view room it was bad and toilet is not clean. 2. We transferred to a sea view room it was clean and good view for the sea. 3. Toilet in the reception is not clean at all. 4. staff are polite and good listeners.

amenities: Refrigerator,Safe,Room service,Air conditioning,Laundry service,Dry cleaning,24-hour front desk,Newspaper,Currency exchange,Baggage storage,Restaurant,Wifi,Business Centre with Internet Access,Airport transportation,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Babysitting,Beach,Bar / lounge,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Paid private parking on-site
location: 236 El Kornish Road, Azarita, FL5, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Since 1951 Ramsis Hotel is one of the famous hotels in alexandria combining between modernity & nobility of our beloved Alexandria .The Hotel is situated in the downtown of Alexandria with unique full sea view .The Hotel is Three stars, deluxe, sea view & modern hotel that provides all the services you need. The hotel is accommodated with very comfortable and well-furnished 30 rooms and 2 suites & 5 Hotel appartments

name: Jeddah Hotel
amenities: Family rooms,Wake-up service / alarm clock,Iron,Telephone,Seating area,Safe,Complimentary toiletries,Bath / shower,Interconnected rooms available,Housekeeping,Fireplace,Air conditioning,Bathrobes,Soundproof rooms,24-hour front desk,Non-smoking hotel,Baggage storage,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Restaurant,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Paid public parking on-site
location: 137 El Gueish St, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Finding an ideal budget friendly small hotel in Alexandria does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Jeddah Hotel, a nice option for travellers like you.Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, a fireplace, and a seating area, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the small hotel.Jeddah Hotel features 24 hour front desk and baggage storage, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Jeddah Hotel, there is paid public parking available on-site.Nearby landmarks such as Stanley Bridge (1.4 mi) and Bibliotheca Alexandrina (1.6 mi) make Jeddah Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Alexandria.If you like falafel, Jeddah Hotel is conveniently located near Gad, which is known for serving up this local favourite.Plus, during your trip, donât forget to check out some of the popular history museums, such as Alexandria National Museum, El Kobba El Samaweya, and Eliahu Hanady Synagogue.Jeddah Hotel puts the best of Alexandria at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Palma Inn Resort Montazah Palace
amenities: Family rooms,Room service,Fireplace,Air conditioning,Laundry service,Concierge,Baggage storage,Spa,Car hire,Airport transportation,Restaurant,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Bicycle rental,Beach,Free breakfast,Sauna,Outdoor pool,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Free parking
location: Palma Inn (Ghazal compound) - Qasr Montazah Garden, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Due to a conference in Alexandria we were unable to book other hotels and thought this one would be good. Price is very high for what you get. Room was noisy, with drilling and construction ongoing inside the hotel at 1am. Breakfast only starts at 9am so itâs useless for business travellers, although breakfast box was offered, we preferred not to take it. Room is very basic. Only plus point was cleanliness which is why the rating is poor rather than terrible.

amenities: Air conditioning,Beach,Restaurant
location: Tareq el Geish Sidi Beshr, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Finding an ideal budget friendly guest house in Alexandria does not have to be difficult. Welcome to El Mahrousa Navy Guest House, a nice option for travellers like you.Rooms at El Mahrousa Navy Guest House offer air conditioning.During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including room service. Guests of El Mahrousa Navy Guest House are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant.While staying at El Mahrousa Navy Guest House, visitors can check out Ahmad Salem Mosque (2.4 mi), which is a popular Alexandria attraction.While staying in Alexandria, you can check out a popular cafe like Arous El Selsela, which is serving up some great dishes.El Mahrousa Navy Guest House puts the best of Alexandria at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Fouad Hotel
location: 15 El Shohadaa St. Raml Station, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: I had stayed in this hotel with my wife.. Firstly they are one family managed the hotel.. You will feel free when you open your balcony and see the sea specially in the sunset... The hotel located in a unique building reminds me that I travelled to the 50ths... The room is very cozy and not very big but comfortable and if you have any problems in the room, they can fix it immediately... The owner is very kind and helpful person always welcome the guests.. The staff is very friendly and helpful.. I didn't book the room with the breakfast but if I wanted any drinks, they can bring it to your room with extra charge not expensive... Great people and great location in the centre of the city.. Very recommended... Big thanks for all the staff and I will return soon to this lovely place

name: New Hotel
location: Al Aibiari, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: New hotel is located by the sea, affordable and clean. Very respectful staff, there's shared kitchen and two bathrooms for each males and females. Each room has some books and some rooms has a view of the sea.  Great compared to other places in Alexandria and for it's price and location.

description: One of the hotels where we come every year. The best thing there is the wonderful view from the balcony, you can see the sea and the trees. The hall is comfortable with free and good quality WiFi. The staff is so friendly and helpful, they always ask if you need anything. The price is resonable. The room service is available and is good. I highly recommend this hotel if you need a quiet and lovely place for the family.

name: Union Hotel
amenities: Private balcony,Laundry service,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi)
location: 164 Sharia 26th, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: Union Hotel is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Alexandria, offering a budget friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to some of Alexandria's most popular landmarks, such as Saint Mark's Coptic Orthodox Cathedral (0.2 mi) and El Qaed Ibrahim Mosque (0.3 mi), Union Hotel is a great destination for tourists.Union Hotel is a budget friendly hotel offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free internet access is offered to guests.Plus, guests can enjoy free breakfast, which has made this a popular choice among travellers visiting Alexandria.While visiting Alexandria, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as White and Blue Restaurant, Fish Market, or Kadoura Restaurant.Alexandria is also home to Montazah Palace Gardens, a popular garden that is not too far from Union Hotel.Enjoy your stay in Alexandria!

name: Alexander the Great Apartment Hotel
amenities: Bath / shower,Iron,Telephone,Seating area,Air conditioning,Washing machine
location: Montazah Corniche, Alexandria 21599 Egypt
description: walking distance from the railway station but a good long walk one flight up in an office building good location near to everything - west of downtown and south of the corniche area.  a cheap taxi ride to anywhere, or you can also walk to pretty much any tourist site or restaurant.  get a card from the reception as the taxi drivers need it to find this place which they don't seem to know... i had a huge room but some are small, so ask for a big room.   very friendly and english speaking staff is helpful on all matters. the rooms were pretty and cheerful and clean and the bath was just perfect, so that was nice. the breakfast was just fine. the only thing i ran into was that the prices of the tours they arranged for me seemed to go up while i was on them, and therefore were not clearly set out at the beginning, so be careful with this.  the tours were very good though, but the pricing was suspicious, and, i thought, way too high.  all in all it was a very friendly safe feeling hotel, like being at home with a nice family kind of thing.  very cheerful and in a good, convenient safe neighborhood. i would certainly return here, and was glad i had chosen it. there were, in other site's reviews, complaints that it is noisy, being across from a school.  well, it is charming being across from the school, seeing the parents bringing the kids to school in the morning and coming to pick them up in the afternoon, and, being a school, it is just the noise of the kids during the school day, so it is dead quiet at night when it matters !!â¦

name: Elsraya Studios and Apartments (Families Only)
location: 14 Awad Hegazy AlGaish Street, Alexandria 12345 Egypt
description: The apartment is situated just opposite to the Alexandria Corniche. The location is central. There is a market at a 5mins walk where you can find grocery if you are interested in cooking. The apartment had a clean room, a small washroom, a kitchen and a tv lounge. It was well maintained and kitchen had all the crockery available for cooking. We made breakfast there. There was however a strange smell in the apartment that was a negative point. There are no mobile signals inside the apartment however the wifi is good.

name: Trio Sea View Hotel
amenities: Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Restaurant
location: Mohamed el agamy, hanoville, Dekhela Alexandria
description: I had booked this hotel from the 16/6/18 to the 19/6/18 paid by Expedia booking. When we arrived the man behind reception was rude and said I needed to pay double the amount paid to Expedia for the room, even thou I had already paid in full to Expedia. Then he told me it was because two people where sleeping in the one room. Yet on the Expedia website we had paid for 2 people sleeping in the one room. At reception they made me feel belittled. The manager then asked me to pay in cash more as it was Expedia fault and I needed to pay double. I explained I wouldnât be given them anymore for Expedia mistakes that they needed to take it up with them! Even after I showed the hotel that I had paid the correct balance, they still wanted more from me. After an hour of standing at reception a man came along and explained it was not my fault and they had to take it up with h Expedia directly we where given a room. The was dirty. The bin was full and the lights didnât work in the room. We had travelled by bus from Giza to Alexandria for Eid celebrations, we where tired. Yet the directions to hotel when we booked said 2 meter walk into main Alexandria. It was miles away from Alexandria!!!  We both decided after the treatment we had at reception and the dirty state of the room to just get in a taxis and not stay in this hotel. So we took our suitcases back down stairs and I explained we wouldnât be staying due to the treatment we received and due to room being extremely dirty. They just looked at me and said ok, but you will not get a refund for the room.  Completely disappointed about this hotel and I will never be back or recommend it! We got into a beautiful hotel in the centre of Alexandria and they treated us like Queens. â¦

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: Dr Abd Al Aziz Al Shennawy St, Cairo 11511 Egypt
description: You are invited to escape the noise and the pollution and to enjoy the peaceful atmosphere on Al Masa spectacular heights. While sitting under a pergola surrounded by the stunning nature enjoy beverage of choice that are served to match the moment. It is the spot for a quiet, contemplative moment where you can enjoy the tranquility of the environment. In a one-of-a-kind experience, imagine your self-hiking along one of the most beautiful ridge walks in the green foothills. Al Masa Hotel features a terrace with a swimming pool. In the green area of Nasr City, it includes 5 restaurants and a spa center. All the elegant rooms have a balcony. Al Masa Hotel has a selection of activities, including different types of massages, Billiards, cinema and bowling. Cairo International Airport is a 10-minute drive and Cairo International Conference Centre is just a 5-minute drive away. The center of Cairo and the Egyptian Museum are both 20 minutes away by car.
